#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

long long int count=0;
int n;
int visited[150][150]={0};
int ar[150][150];

int maze(int x,int y)
      {
      	 if((x==n-1)&&(y==n-1))
      	 {
      	    count++;
      	    return 0;
         }
      	 
      	 visited[x][y]=1;
		   
		 if(y-1>=0)
      	 {
      	 	if((visited[x][y-1]==0)&&(ar[x][y-1]==0))
      	 	maze(x,y-1);
      	 }
      	 
      	 if(x-1>=0)
      	 {
      	 	if((visited[x-1][y]==0)&&(ar[x-1][y]==0))
      	 	maze(x-1,y);
      	 }
      	 
      	 if(x+1<n)
      	 {
      	    if((visited[x+1][y]==0)&&(ar[x+1][y]==0))
      	 	maze(x+1,y);
      	 }
      	 
      	 if(y+1<n)
      	 {
      	 	if((visited[x][y+1]==0)&&(ar[x][y+1]==0))
      	 	maze(x,y+1);
      	 }      
		   
		   
		 visited[x][y]=0;  	 
      	 
      }



int main()
{
	  scanf("%d",&n);
	
	  int i,j;
	
	  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	  {
	   for(j=0;j<n;j++) 
	   scanf("%d",&ar[i][j]);
	  }
	  
	  maze(0,0);
	  
	  printf("%lld",count);
}
